name: Drakhanth Blaze
backStory:
Once a mere ember flickering in the boundless infernos of the deepest hell pits, Drakhanth Blaze has transcended into a raging fire demon by the ancient pacts forged in blood and flames. Orphaned during the notorious ‘Embryonic Cinders Rebellion’, Drakhanth was found and taken captive by Kal’athrys, the Overlord of Eternal Pyres. Under profound tutelage, he learned the dark arts of fire conjuring and manipulation. Gifted yet cursed with an eternal flame, Drakhanth emerged from his captor’s chains and proclaimed himself a sovereign master of annihilation bent on feeding the realms to voracious fevers of hell embers.
To raise his empires above Veiled Consecration and beyond could disrupt balance by pushing heavenly veils into hellous cascades. Now amidst occluded torrentages dwelling Vernacaea fiolet veacriti ses unfolded bonds unattuned!
